title: Level 7 tokens from aram?
body: I got an s on {{champion:17}} on whom im level 6 and i didnt get a level 7 token. The game was aram so that might be why. Can someone confirm whether or not you can get level 7 tokens on aram.

replies.body: You can't get tokens from ARAMs (or any other mode). You can only earn tokens on PvP SR.
Around 45-50 champions at level 5 and not a single one 6+. It's a hard knock life being an ARAM only player. xD
